demo.title: Immigration Tools Demo
demo.chatDescription: Ask questions about immigration programs, check your eligibility, or get guidance on your application.
demo.aboutDescription: Learn about the immigration tools available through our AI assistant.
demo.eligibilityDescription: Our eligibility calculator evaluates your profile against immigration program requirements. It considers factors like age, education, work experience, language proficiency, and nationality to determine which programs you might qualify for.
demo.searchDescription: Our search tool provides access to up-to-date immigration information, including program details, requirements, application processes, and more.
